articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Pyon Yong Rip
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Pyon Yong Rip
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of winner of Order of Kim Il Sung and Order of Kim Jong Il, candidate academician, prof. and dr. Pyon Yong Rip, former secretary general of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, expressing deep condolence over his death.

articles.title: Greetings to Moldovan President-elect
articles.content:
Greetings to Moldovan President-elect
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Igor Dodon upon his election as president of the Republic of Moldova on Tuesday.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in conformity with the desire of the peoples of the two countries, the message wished the president-elect success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Bulgarian President-elect
articles.content:
Greetings to Bulgarian President-elect
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Rumen Radev upon his election as president of the Republic of Bulgaria on Tuesday.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests, the message wished the Bulgarian president-elect success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Russian Government Sends Aid Materials to Afflicted-area in Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Russian Government Sends Aid Materials to Afflicted-area in Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Aid materials sent by the Russian government as regards the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK arrived on the spot.
					 There were transfer and delivery of the materials in Pyongyang and Rason City on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation headed by Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the third Asia-Pacific regional high-level meeting on children's rights held in Kuala Lumpur.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls in which orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their revolutionary lives.

articles.title: Phyongsong Orphans' Primary and Secondary Schools Completed
articles.content:
Phyongsong Orphans' Primary and Secondary Schools Completed
 Phyongsong, November 15 (KCNA) -- New Phyongsong Orphans' Primary School and Phyongsong Orphans' Secondary School were completed.
					 The schools are equipped with multi-functional classrooms, hostels, gymnasiums, swimming pools, comprehensive public service facilities and all other amenities for study and life of children on the highest level.
					
					 Inaugural ceremonies took place on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Player Takes First Place in Half Marathon of Great Eastern Women's Run 2016
articles.content:
DPRK Player Takes First Place in Half Marathon of Great Eastern Women's Run 2016 
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Jo Un Ok won the trophy cup and a gold medal at the half marathon of the Great Eastern Women's Run held in Singapore on Nov. 13.
					 DPRK another player Kim Hye Song took the second place.
					
					 The run brought together more than ten ace runners and at least 15,000 amateurs from 9 countries and regions including Cambodia, Kazakhstan and Kenya.
					
					 The DPRK players returned home on Tuesday.

articles.title: Fishery Stations of DPRK Make Good Results in Fishing
articles.content:
Fishery Stations of DPRK Make Good Results in Fishing
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Fishery stations under the Ministry of Fisheries in the DPRK are making good hauls at the main fishing ground in the sea off Thongchon.
					 They have caught a large amount of fish until now from late October, 4.5 times the output in the same period of last year.
					
					 According to O Kwang Dok, an official of the ministry, such good results in fishing were thanks to the introduction of factory and transport ships and the reduction of unloading time.

articles.title: Mothers of DPRK Blessed by Great Persons
articles.content:
Mothers of DPRK Blessed by Great Persons
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- November 16 is Mother's Day in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 With the day as an occasion, all sons and daughters across the country are extending warm greetings to their mothers who have devoted themselves to bringing up their children and helping their husbands to be loyal to the socialist motherland.
					
					 When socialist construction was going on in the country after the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), President Kim Il Sung made sure that the first national meeting of mothers was convened. And he personally attended the meeting to give a high appreciation of ardent patriotism and humanity displayed by the mothers, who readily sent their husbands and sons and daughters to the war and brought up orphans with parental affection and worked feats in the postwar rehabilitation.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il attached importance to the mothers' role in preparing the younger generations to be reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche and had guided them to do a great thing for the good of the country and people, the society and the collective.
					
					 And he showed warm love for the mothers, saying that admirable children are reared by good mothers.
					
					 Under his loving care, a large contingent of women revolutionaries had emerged in the country, among them Choe Jong Ok at the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine, Kim Kwi Sun at the Wonsan Knitwear Factory and Ri Myong Suk living in Rangnang District, Pyongyang, who have devoted their all to the country's prosperity, the assistance to servicepersons and the bringing up of orphans.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who is creditably carrying forward the intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, saw to it that Mother's Day was instituted and the fourth national meeting of mothers was convened.
					
					 Today mothers in the DPRK harden their will to invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun (military-first) and socialism guided by Kim Jong Un with high pride of being blessed by the great leaders through generations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Eternal Tradition of Victory of Juche Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Eternal Tradition of Victory of Juche Korea
Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have provided a guarantee for lasting peace with strong power of justice by their own efforts. Therefore, they are capable of taking an initiative in steering the change in the situation and have a treasured sword for preserving peace and stability. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has taken the toughest counteractions one after another against the hostile forces' arrogant provocations against it, thus fully demonstrating its firm will to react to a nuclear threat in kind.
					
					 The DPRK sent a solemn warning to the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group that they should properly understand the former's daily growing national power and take a right option as they are resorting to reckless moves, swimming against the trend of the times. 
					
					 They paid high prices for taking foolish actions in defiance of the warning.
					
					 The tradition of victory of Songun Korea remains unchanged in the DPRK-U.S. confrontation which has lasted for the last several decades.
					
					 Such stereotyped sanctions cannot work on the DPRK as it has achieved the country's economic development and improved the standard of the people's living not with the help from others but in the invincible spirit of self-development, 
					
					 The DPRK is making an eye-opening leap forward and displaying tremendous might by advancing along the invariable orbit of independence, Songun and socialism. They are dynamically steering the movement for global independence and their attractive power is increasing as time wears on.
					
					 If the enemies make desperate efforts to isolate and stifle the DPRK, obsessed with a daydream, swimming against the irresistible trend of the times, they will suffer a bitterer defeat.

articles.title: Position of DPRK as Nuclear Power in East to Grow Strong: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Position of DPRK as Nuclear Power in East to Grow Strong: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is feeling extremely uneasy and experiencing frustrations as its scenario to do harm to the DPRK through nuclear blackmail went up in smoke only to threaten the security of its mainland, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is not in a position to deny the tremendous power of the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear power in the East, no matter how hard it tries to do so.
					
					 The U.S. used to unleash wars against other countries to dominate them, being proud that even not a single shell has ever dropped on its mainland.
					
					 But the curtain is falling on the era of U.S. domination.
					
					 The U.S., styling itself the world's only superpower, has fished in troubled waters, turning several regions into mayhem.
					
					 Now the U.S. strategy for mounting a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK has gone bust, becoming a factor of threatening its security.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with its nukes.
					
					 Americans are now unable to sleep in peace because of the nightmare that their mainland may suffer a nuclear disaster.
					
					 It is a daydream to do harm to the DPRK through sanctions and pressure.
					
					 The position of the DPRK will grow strong and its military muscle become unimaginably tremendous in the future, too.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. National Security Chief's S. Korean Junket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. National Security Chief's S. Korean Junket
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the director of the U.S. National Security Agency who doubles as cyber commander of the U.S. forces paid an unofficial visit to south Korea during which he was closeted with gentries of the puppet Ministries of Defense and Foreign Affairs.
					 They were reported to have discussed the "proposal of cooperation" to cope with the "cyber threat from the north", but no one believes such absurd assertion.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms such trip the one of the master aimed to save the pro-U.S. regime from its collapse and shore up the colonial ruling system.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is nothing but a poor farce staged by the American master and his servant to hype the fictitious story about "cyber threat from the north" in a bid to escalate the tension and divert elsewhere public attention and thus prop up the south Korean conservative regime.
					
					 This only betrays the awkward position of the U.S. as it makes desperate efforts to save his stooge from a dilemma and the poor fate of the south Korean puppet forces clinging to the coattails of their master like a drowning man.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, there is no way out for the Park Geun Hye group. 
					
					 The desperate frenzy made by the puppet forces in a bid to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north and prolong their remaining days backed by the U.S. would only touch off bitterer hatred and resentment at them among all compatriots and precipitate history's stern judgment.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Regime's Confrontation Moves and Military Provocations
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Regime's Confrontation Moves and Military Provocations
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean group of traitors have gone ever more reckless in their moves for escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and military provocations against it.
					 South Korean puppet military warmongers issued what they called "commanding message" and inspected several units, getting more frantic with war drills against the north than ever before.
					
					 Brass hats of the army and the navy are frequenting frontline units, claiming that "the north may pose threat and commit provocation" by taking advantage of "administration" vacuum and crying out for "round-the-clock watch posture." And the chief of the general staff of the air force called for "prompt counteraction" aboard a reconnaissance plane, kicking up war hysteria.
					
					 All these moves were prompted by a foolish intention to seek a way out even through the escalation of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and military provocations after being thrown into a political crisis caused by the worst power-backed scandal. 
					
					 Waves of popular resistance against the traitorous rule are now sweeping across south Korea in the wake of the disclosure of the world-shocking "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal."
					
					 The campaigns for issuing declarations on the situation in demand of the ouster of Park are rapidly gaining in scope and strength. Candlelight rallies of people from all walks of life calling for impeachment of Park vividly show the mindset of the angered south Korean people who have already sentenced the traitors for all ages to death.
					
					 Now that Park is being condemned not only by the opposition parties but also by conservative forces, she is trying hard to seek a way out in prodding the warmongers into intensifying saber-rattling.
					
					 She is working hard to weather the worst ruling crisis under the pretext of "security crisis", talking about "emergency situation." This is what she inherited from her father.
					
					 In actuality, the puppet military has declared an "emergency system" reminiscent of the situation on the eve of war under the pretext of the crisis of the regime and the "administration" vacuum.
					
					 They simultaneously launched Chungmu drill for the latter half of 2016 allegedly aimed to "verify the effectiveness of the plan for civilians, officials and service members' wartime preparedness" and kicked off 2016 Hoguk rehearsal under the signboard of "coping with the north's provocation of a local war and all-out war" almost at the same time.
					
					 They also staged a madcap airlifting drill and large-scale joint landing drill, kicking up war hysteria. They went the lengths of conducting a joint exercise with a British air force for the first time in history under the simulated conditions of making "precision strike" at the supreme headquarters of the DPRK and its major strategic targets.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that a south Korean media, commenting on the above-said anti-north war drills which may spill over into an actual war anytime, observed that "the muscle-flexing is linked with the Choe Sun Sil Gate."
					
					 The said ceaseless saber-rattling goes to clearly prove that the Park group unhesitatingly resorts to any play with fire which may put the destiny of the nation at peril in order to prolong its remaining days.
					
					 The "emergency system" declared by the group of traitors is now under strong fire by all compatriots.
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind what miserable end the warmongers met.

articles.title: S. Korean On-line Newspaper Demands Earlier Ouster of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean On-line Newspaper Demands Earlier Ouster of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean on-line newspaper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on Nov. 14 demanded earlier ouster of Park Geun Hye.
					 Recalling more than a million people participated in the third all-people action on Nov. 12 to demand Park's resignation for the first time since the June resistance in 1987, the editorial said:
					
					 Park and her regime steered by the "Saenuri party" are hit hard from all sides and making desperate efforts but are bound to meet ruin due to its internal strife.
					
					 If Park makes a sincere apology, though belatedly, and steps down at once, she may pin hope on the popular masses' generosity even a bit, but if not, it will further precipitate the total destruction of the conservative forces.

articles.title: Candlelight Mass Rally Orders Ouster of "President": S. Korean Newspaper
articles.content:
Candlelight Mass Rally Orders Ouster of "President": S. Korean Newspaper
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News carried an editorial titled "A million candle-holders ordered ouster of president."
					 The editorial said:
					
					 The public mindset manifested in the candlelight actions involving a million people was clear and resolute.
					
					 Ouster of Park means a new start, not confusion.
					
					 The public mindset reflects ardent desire to build a new order and community in the south Korean society, not merely the ouster of the "president."
					
					 The actions started with the demand of the "president's" ouster but will bring about a new social system and a new era in the end.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Urged to Step Down At Once
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Urged to Step Down At Once
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Nov. 13 in an editorial demanded Park Geun Hye step down at once.
					 It said that on November 12 one million people met in Seoul after nearly 30 years since the resistance for democracy in December of 1987.
					
					 On November 13 a spokesman for Chongwadae hinted that Park Geun Hye has no intention to step down, saying "she is racking her brain to normalize the state affairs and the representative of the "Saenuri Party" rejected the immediate resignation and disbandment of the upper echelon of the party, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The Nov. 12 rally showed that the people no longer recognize Park Geun Hye, the chief culprit of the criminal acts such as the monopolization of "state affairs", breach of "constitution" and encroachment upon the people's sovereignty, as "president".
					
					 The normalization of "state affairs" is premised on the immediate resignation of Park.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Demand Immediate Resignation of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Demand Immediate Resignation of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- 138 religionists of the Jonju Parish of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice on Monday issued a declaration on the situation demanding the Park Geun Hye regime to step down, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 In the declaration they said they cannot entrust Park with the state administration as she was engrossed with selfishness and self-righteousness. 
					
					 They noted that what the people demand is for Park to step down and become a citizen.
					
					 They said that they would launch action with candlelights in their hands together with citizens, calling upon all religionists and citizens to join in their action.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on Nov. 13 said that Obama's policy of "strategic patience" toward the north has been accused as non-countermeasure for the past 8 years, in fact.
					 For the people in the south, it is necessary to reduce all upkeep for U.S. forces and retake the upkeep which has been allotted during the period and U.S. military bases.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Stage Actions in Solidarity with S. Korean People
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Stage Actions in Solidarity with S. Korean People 
Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Koreans in different parts of the world on Nov. 12 staged solidarity actions demanding traitor Park Geun Hye step down, timed to coincide with the 3rd all-people action of south Korean people from all walks of life.
					That day they held meetings in at least 40 cities of more than 10 countries including the U.S., France, UK, Germany, Canada, Australia and Japan to condemn Park Geun Hye's crimes.
					
					Koreans in Tokyo staged a street demonstration and scattered leaflets disclosing her crimes.
					
					Koreans in Osaka staged a protest action outside the south Korean puppet embassy in Japan.
					
					They read out a protest letter and handed it to the embassy.
					
					The letter denounced the Park regime for its misrule, adding that overseas compatriots urged Park to step down.
					
					Similar demonstrations took place in Hyogo and Aichi prefectures.
					
					There took place a meeting of Koreans and students in Germany demanding the Park regime step down at a plaza of Berlin.
					
					Koreans and students in France held a meeting urging Park to step down at a plaza in Paris.
					
					The participants issued a joint declaration on the situation before staging a demonstration demanding the resignation of Park.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter to Participants in 7th Congress of GFTUK Introduced in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter to Participants in 7th Congress of GFTUK Introduced in Germany
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on Nov. 10 posted on its website "The Duty of the Working Class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Times and the Tasks Facing Trade Union Organizations", a letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), on Oct. 25, Juche 105 (2016).
					 The letter indicates the tasks and ways for the heroic working class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to become an engine steering the ranks of the general onward march and a model for all other members of the society to follow in dynamically stepping up the building of a powerful socialist country, holding aloft the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Syria
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The Syrian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on November 9.
					 Fairouz Mousa, director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Baath Arab Socialist Party of Syria, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from November 10 to December 17 and decided to launch publicity campaign praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and hold diverse political and cultural events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian committee for remembering the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed in Addis Ababa on Nov. 9.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, co-chairman of the African regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising the Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting and seminar to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian committee for remembering the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 11.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee at the instruction of Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and hold political and cultural events on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Pyon Yong Rip
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Pyon Yong Rip
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 15 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Pyon Yong Rip, ex secretario general del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, quien es candidato al academico, profesor titular y doctor condecorado con la Orden Kim Il Sung y la Orden Kim Jong Il, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Inauguradas Escuelas Primaria y Secundaria de Internado de Phyongsong
articles.content:
Inauguradas Escuelas Primaria y Secundaria de Internado de Phyongsong
Phyongsong, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Se han levantado las Escuelas Primaria y Secundaria de Internado de Phyongsong. 
					Las escuelas disponen en el maximo nivel de las aulas multifuncionales, albergues, gimnasio, piscina, establecimiento de servicios publicos y otras condiciones y ambientes necesarios al estudio y la vida de los matriculados. 
					
					Las ceremonias de inauguracion tuvieron lugar este martes.

articles.title: Se consolidara la posicion de RPDC como potencia nuclear, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Se consolidara la posicion de RPDC como potencia nuclear, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Ya que resulto fracasado su intento de atropellar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con el chantaje nuclear, EE.UU. se siente ahora muy inquieto y frustrado por el peligro que corre la seguridad del territorio nacional.
					 Ese pais ya no puede negar, aunque quiere hacerlo tanto, el poderio inagotable de la RPDC convertida en la potencia nuclear del Oriente.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					  Actualmente, va terminando la epoca de dominacion de EE.UU. que se acostumbraba a imponer la guerra y la subyugacion a otros paises jactandose de que en su territorio nacional no se haya caido ni una sola bomba.
					
					  Hasta la fecha, la unica superpotencia controlaba a sus caprichos varias regiones del mundo para satisfacer sus intereses.
					
					  La estrategia de ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC se hizo inutil y hasta se convirtio en un dolor de cabeza y amenaza para la seguridad nacional del primero.
					
					  Termino una vez por todas la epoca en que EE.UU. ejercia unilateralmente la amenaza y chantaje nucleares sobre la RPDC.
					
					  El intento de derrocar a la RPDC con la sancion y presion es una ilusion nunca realizable.
					
					  La posicion de la RPDC se consolidara mas en futuro y su poderio militar se tornara cada dia mas formidable.

articles.title: ACNC comenta imprudente movimiento militar de belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta imprudente movimiento militar de belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Sobrepasan el nivel alarmante la campana de confrontacion fratricida de la banda traidora surcoreana y sus provocaciones militares.
					Recientemente, los cabecillas de la capa militar surcoreana emitieron el llamado "mensaje de mando" a las unidades y organizan mas que nunca los ejercicios de guerra anti-Norte (de Corea).
					
					Al decir que el "Norte puede ejercer la amenaza y cometer acto provocador" aprovechando el vacio de la "administracion estatal" en el Sur de Corea, los jefes de las fuerzas terrestres y maritimas recorrieron las unidades en la primera linea del frente instruyendo el "mantenimiento de vigilancia de 24 horas".
					
					Mientras tanto, el jefe del Estado Mayor de las Fuerzas Aereas abogo por el "castigo inmediato" realizando un vuelo en un avion de reconocimiento.
					
					Estas provocaciones militares, que forman parte de la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida, parten del siniestro intento de buscar la salvacion de la crisis politica en que cayeron los traidores surcoreanos por el escandalo de abuso del poder sin precedentes en que son figuras claves Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil.
					
					Este caso llevo al climax en todas partes del Sur de Corea el clima de resistencia masiva contra la gobernacion vendepatria.
					
					El movimiento de publicar la declaracion sobre la situacion y el mar de manifestantes con velas, que se extienden a todos los circulos sociales en demanda de la dimision de Park Geun-hye, son una expresion coherente de la indignacion del pueblo que ya le condeno a la muerte.
					
					La traidora Park, rechazada por los partidos opositores e incluso por una parte de las fuerzas conservadoras, esta desesperada para escaparse de la crisis al instigar a los gangsteres militares a los ejercicios de guerra de mayor dimension.
					
					Evadir la peor crisis de gobernacion tomando como pretexto la "situacion de emergencia" y la "crisis de seguridad" es el temperamento ingenito que Park Geun-hye heredo de su padre.
					
					Realmente, la capa militar pone en activo el "sistema de emergencia" tomando como pretexto la crisis del "gobierno" y la paralizacion de "administracion estatal".
					
					E inicio simultaneamente el entrenamiento "Chungmu del segundo semestre de 2016" para "verificar la eficacia del plan de preparacion para el tiempo de guerra de la poblacion, el gobierno y el ejercito" y el ejercicio "Hoguk 2016" bajo el cartel de "prepararse para la provocacion local del Norte y el estado de guerra total".
					
					Se suman a ello el entrenamiento de ataque aereo intensivo y la maniobra conjunta de desembarco de gran envergadura.
					
					Por primera vez en la historia, las fuerzas aereas britanicas se incorporaron al ejercicio conjunto para el "ataque preciso" contra la Direccion Suprema y los principales blancos estrategicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					No es casual que un medio de prensa surcoreano reportara que tales movimientos de la capa militar surcoreana tienen que ver con el escandalo de Choe Sun Sil.
					
					Los simultaneos y multiples ejercicios belicos comprueban que la banda de Park Geun-hye es el colectivo de traidores que para salvarse, convierten a la nacion entera en la victima de guerra.
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos deberan actuar con prudencia aprendiendo la leccion del fin tragico de los belicistas.
